main.name: Damaso Fernandez
main.bio: I'm a Christ Follower and a very passionate person of CS, I love to work with new technologies, and I love to learn from others.
main.contactmessage: If you have an idea, of a web app or mobile app, contact me, you'll put your project in good hands.

education.description: Was a great experience learning from top teachers in the area of embedded devices, and IOT, one of my best experience learning from great teachers.
A great Univerisity with great teachers, that have taught me about the majority of things I know in CS, such as data structures, Databases and good programming practices

work.title: QA Engineer
work.description: Here I have been developing as QA, in manual testing, but also Automated testing using tools like cypress and Gitlab for the CI

projects.title: Android App
projects.category: A CRUD Android app for a company

projects.title: React Native App
projects.category: An App to register daily payments, I use in this project ReactNative and Redux, and as backend I use Firebase, essentialy using cloud firestore and using cloud functions too.

testimonials.text: But one thing I do: Forgetting what is behind and straining toward what is ahead...
